title: Expansive Learning in Automotive Service Systems: Applying Cultural-Historical Activity Theory [Large-Scale]

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic automotive service concepts and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: A course cultivating the ability to analyze automotive service systems as social activity systems, focusing on language arts education

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts of cultural-historical activity theory and apply them to automotive service systems
Learners can identify contradictions within automotive service systems and propose solutions through expansive learning processes
Learners can complete a service system improvement project collaboratively with peers using online collaboration tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
